name: Drive and Drop
description:
Hey driver, someone is waiting for your pick-up.

Long press the screen to speed up and pick your customer up at the purple area, drive safely to earn money, the faster you drop him off, the more extra fee you can get. Upgrade your car to carry more people.

Be careful to drive! Any accidents you cause will lose your money!

Features: .
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* You can amass cashes even when you are not playing it
* Many cool cars wait for you to unlock
